notes: 🧠 MISSION: Final Functional QA and Tag/Archive
🎯 GOAL: Validate all previous phases; tag, backup, and archive a clean, working state for production or UI refactor.
✅ PRE-CHECK: Ensure all previous checkpoints have passed, and commit/tag a final pre-archive rollback point.
📌 CONTEXT: This locks the baseline for future UI/role/theming passes.
🔐 RELEVANCE: Prevents regressions and provides a single rollback point for release or refactor.
onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically

actions: Validate that all previous functional blocks have been executed and all checkpoints are passing (review git tags and backup status).
Run app in all supported modes (cold start, resume, onboarding, premium gating, navigation) and verify with smoke/manual tests.
If any phase fails, alert and rerun the corresponding block with PATCH or FIX as needed.
phases.commit: test: final functional QA and archive complete

final.commit: validate: full system check and pass/fail logging
final.notes: Updated for post-token-refactor validation and safe runtime boot.
